input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Ryan's Room Fluff and Fold Laundry Room

Item keywords:
7-piece set
Includes a cute little washer, dryer
Comes with ironing board with iron
Includes vacuum, mop and bucket
Keep your house tip-top
Scaled to fit your Ryan's Room dollhouse

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Ryan's Room Fluff and Fold Laundry Room is a 7-piece set that includes a cute little washer, dryer, ironing board with iron, vacuum, mop and bucket. With Fluff and Fold Laundry Room, you can keep your house tip-top while teaching your child the importance of cleaning up and taking care of their belongings. The set is scaled to fit your Ryan's Room dollhouse and encourages imaginative play.
input_text.Response B: Keep your dollhouse neat and tidy with the Ryan's Room Fluff and Fold Laundry Room. This 7-piece set includes everything you need to keep your house tip-top, including a cute little washer, dryer, ironing board with iron, vacuum, mop and bucket. The pieces are scaled to fit your Ryan's Room dollhouse and will make the perfect addition to any dollhouse.

label_annotations.factors_a: Great description and makes it sound exciting
label_annotations.factors_b: Perfect sales pitch to make the product sound great
label_annotations.feedback: Both were really good responses. B lists all the items so just slightly beats A
